article.aria-label: Charter offers free Spectrum Internet & WiFi for 60 days to K-12 & College Students

h3.a: Charter offers free Spectrum Internet & WiFi for 60 days to K-12 & College Students

img.alt: Charter offers free Spectrum Internet & WiFi for Students.

div.div: Charter is offering free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription. Installation fees also will be waived for new student households.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 640px; height: 457px;

div.div: This year, our district’s top spellers are:
1st Place – Alexia Contreras, 8th Grade, Berta Cabaza Middle School
2nd Place – Ariel De Leon, 5th Grade, Dr. C.M. Cash Elementary
3rd Place – Sebastian Saldivar, 3rd Grade, Sullivan Environmental Science Academy

address.span: 240 N. Crockett St., San Benito, TX 78586
